## toolsium init

Setup toolsium

```
toolsium init [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -a, --awsProfile string   AWS Profile (default "default")
  -d, --department string   Department filter
  -h, --help                help for init
  -m, --mfa_serial string   The MFA serial for your account
      --skip-aws            Skip AWS configure
```
